name: Shadow The Hedgehog (itch)
description:
Shadow has found out that Sonic got himself a human girlfriend! Now it's up to YOU to help him find one too! Join Shadow on this quick adventure of romance with multiple endings to discover!

(This is a test game I created to learn how to use ren'py and practice coding. I don't own anything, and this is just for funs and laughs. Enjoy!)
